summit.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an important meeting or set of meetings between the leaders of several governments
summit.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The two presidents agreed to hold a summit in the spring.
summit.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Many people have now reached the summit of Mount Everest.
